Description:
Exception when create document from report with chart script

Steps to reproduce:
1. new a report, insert a chart with chart script. see attached report
2. use genReport in ReportEngine to create document from report

Expected result:
No Exception

Actual result:
006-8-10 11:27:57 org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException logThis
